Text:
Hi 7 could you please upload the new version Of: Leisure Suit Larry Love For Sail (Multi 4)

@pcfan2013 
"New version"? What does that even mean? That game is from '96. Stick to pr0n, it's more fulfilling than Larry.

Is anyone else having trouble getting this game to load?  It installed fine but when I start the game I get the resolution selection menu and after that the game window loads up with a white background but never gets to a main menu or anything.
Same problem as the guy above, it installs great, i go to start it, and the resolution popup pops up, and I click play, and nothing.  Any fix available that anyone else knows?
